Update April 16, 2024

These are the key fixes in the Update from April 16, 2024.

Base Game: - Alive plants will no longer emit green stink clouds. - Power will not be shut off unexpectedly when bills are fully paid.

Gallery Server: - Adjustments to the profanity filter to reduce strictness in handling hashtags and allow uploading of Maxis-created Sims from past games.

Eco Lifestyle: - The Dew Collector will now collect water correctly.

Horse Ranch: - Horse riding now helps Sims lose weight.

Realm of Magic: - Alien-abducted Spellcasters will now give birth to alien babies instead of Sim babies.

For Rent: - Fixed fund transfer issues for landlords with a Residential Rental Lot and a business.

Castle Estate: - Castle Estate Windows now show up in the correct wall height categories.
